Contact us

Talk to our staff at our drop in centre in the Oculus building.

Opening times 8.30 – 2.00pm Mondays to Fridays during term time.

Our helpdesk can also help with general enquires:

Email careers@warwick.ac.uk
Phone +44 (0)24 7652 3011
